name: OpenProject
description: Open source project management software. Powerful classic, agile or hybrid project management in a secure environment.
short_desc: Open source project management software with agile support.
author: OpenProject Community

form_fields.label: SMTP Server Address
form_fields.hint: Hostname of your SMTP server (e.g., smtp.gmail.com)

form_fields.label: SMTP Port
form_fields.hint: Port number for SMTP (default: 587 for TLS, 465 for SSL)

form_fields.label: Email From Address
form_fields.hint: Sender email address for outgoing emails

form_fields.label: Enable STARTTLS
form_fields.hint: Use STARTTLS for port 587 (set to false for port 465)

form_fields.label: Enable SSL
form_fields.hint: Use SSL/TLS for port 465 (set to false for port 587)

form_fields.label: SMTP Authentication
form_fields.hint: Authentication method: plain, login, or cram_md5 (default: plain)

form_fields.label: SMTP Domain
form_fields.hint: HELO domain for SMTP (usually your domain name)

form_fields.label: SSL Verification Mode
form_fields.hint: SSL certificate verification: peer (verify) or none (skip verification)
